site.companySlogan: For Sustainable and Renewable Solar Energy

about.description: A company specialized in solar energy solutions, we provide design and installation services for solar systems for homes and businesses with the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

services.sectionTitle: Trusted Solar Expertise to Power Your Sustainability Goals
services.sectionDesc: Sama Al-Sidra, a leading provider of solar energy solutions in Iraq, offers a comprehensive suite of services tailored to meet the unique needs of both individuals and businesses. From technical assessments and personalized consultations to precision installations and ongoing maintenance, we ensure reliable performance and long-term value from your clean energy investment.
services.solarPanelInstallationDesc: Professional installation of solar panels using the latest technologies to ensure high energy output and system stability. We deliver customized solutions for residential rooftops and commercial buildings to meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency.
services.solarPanelInstallationBenefit: Seamless integration for maximum operational efficiency.
services.maintenanceDesc: Comprehensive maintenance services and rapid-response repair solutions to keep your solar system operating at peak performance. We provide technical inspections, panel cleaning, and replacement of faulty components.
services.maintenanceBenefit: Reliable system uptime through fast and effective technical support.
services.residentialDesc: Innovative solar energy systems tailored to Iraqi households and residential environments. Designed to reduce electricity costs, lower grid dependency, and provide long-term energy savings.
services.residentialBenefit: Flexible designs that grow with your home's energy needs.

whychoose.title: Why We're the Best Choice!
whychoose.descFinal: Choosing your partner in the transition to solar energy goes beyond technical specifications — it’s a commitment to a more sustainable future. At Sama Al-Sidra, we don't just sell systems; we provide a complete experience starting with tailored consultations, offering personalized solar solutions with fully transparent pricing and no hidden costs. We rely on high-quality components built to global standards and operate with full environmental responsibility to ensure a reliable, long-term system. Our responsive support team, extended warranties, and after-sales services are designed to keep your mind at ease for years to come.

partners.title: Sama Al-Sidra Global Partners
partners.desc:
We are proud to partner with leading global solar energy brands, reflecting our commitment to quality and innovation.
These exclusive agencies ensure our clients get reliable and long-term energy solutions they can trust.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.desc: Your satisfaction is our priority. Our team always strives to provide the best solar solutions from the world's top brands, with competitive prices and outstanding 24/7 service. We are the first company in Iraq to use artificial intelligence, a smart calculator, and a team of expert engineers.
testimonials.whatsappFeedback: Don't hesitate to reach out — we're here to listen.

faq.title: Most Common Questions about Sama Al-Sedra & Solar Energy
faq.desc: Here we answer the most important questions about solar energy and Sama Al-Sedra’s services.

items.q: How does Sama Al-Sedra’s solar system work?
items.a: Our systems work by capturing sunlight through premium solar panels and converting it to electricity, ensuring a continuous power supply for your home or business. We use only the best brands, and installation is handled by specialized engineers.

items.q: What benefits do I get by choosing Sama Al-Sedra?
items.a: With Sama Al-Sedra, you get reliable power, lower electricity bills, 24/7 technical support, a smart calculator for system selection, and exclusive access to our AI assistant SamaGPT for instant answers.

items.q: Can I install solar at my house or business in Iraq?
items.a: Absolutely! We provide flexible solutions for all property types in Iraq, with fast installation and genuine product warranties. Our engineers visit you for a free consultation and a tailored plan.

items.q: Is there a warranty and after-sales service?
items.a: All our devices come with authentic warranties. Plus, our after-sales team is available 24/7 for maintenance, support, and troubleshooting—even long after installation.

items.q: What is the advantage of the Smart Energy Calculator?
items.a: Our exclusive Smart Calculator helps you find the best solar system for your needs quickly. Just enter your energy usage, and you’ll see instant, accurate recommendations.

items.q: Does Sama Al-Sedra use AI in its service?
items.a: Yes! We are the first in Iraq to offer an AI robot (SamaGPT) to answer your solar questions, day or night, in Arabic and English, and provide you with the best technical support instantly.

items.q: How long does it take to install a solar system?
items.a: Most installations take 1–3 days, depending on the system size and property complexity. We handle everything from permits to grid connection, for a worry-free experience.
Solar systems need minimal maintenance—mainly cleaning panels a few times a year. We offer ongoing checks and technical support to keep your system efficient.

items.q: Are solar panels effective in cloudy weather?
items.a: Yes, our panels produce electricity even on cloudy days, although with slightly reduced efficiency. We select panels optimized for Iraq’s climate.

items.q: How can I contact you or get more info?
items.a: You can contact us anytime via WhatsApp, phone, or through our website. Plus, our SamaGPT assistant is ready to answer you instantly online!

footer.ctaDesc: Ready to embrace the power of the sun? Take the first step toward a sustainable future with Sama Al-Sedra Solar Energy.
footer.desc: Welcome to Sama Al-Sedra, where global expertise meets local customer care. Our team of specialized engineers delivers the best solar solutions for Iraq and the region.
footer.addressText: Baghdad, Iraq – almansour Dawody St., next to Al-TANKY

calculator.title: Solar Energy Calculator
calculator.aiStartMsg: Start entering your data to design your solar system!
calculator.aiPreviewMsg: AI is analyzing your selections, please wait a few seconds for the plan...
calculator.aiError: Sorry, an error occurred while analyzing data. Please try again later.

warnings.panels: It is recommended to increase the number of panels to match the inverter capacity for better performance.
warnings.battery: It is recommended to choose a larger capacity battery to ensure system stability.

calculator.questionCutHours:
Within your electricity outage schedule, how many hours does the national grid cut off continuously before coming back?

For example: If your schedule is 3 hours off, then 2 hours on, then 3 hours off, just enter 3.
calculator.phonePlaceholder: Enter your phone number to receive cost details via WhatsApp!
calculator.previewText: Your system requires approximately {panels} solar panels based on the selected inverter.
calculator.costText: Cost calculation in progress by the company
calculator.whatsappPrompt: Enter your phone number to receive cost details via WhatsApp!
calculator.consumptionNote: ⚠️ Consumption not clearly defined. Please estimate usage per appliance (e.g., fridge = 2A, TV = 0.5A, light = 0.1A, AC = 6–10A).
calculator.batteryStatus: ⚠️ Your selected battery ({{user}} kWh) is below the required size. We recommend a {{recommended}} kWh battery ({{panelName}}) to ensure full coverage and avoid performance or cost issues.
calculator.inverterStatus: ⚠️ Your selected inverter ({{user}} kW) is not optimal. We recommend {{recommended}} kW to ensure efficient load handling with safety margin.
calculator.efficiencyNote: ⚠️ The system may face challenges due to long outages, low sunlight, or high energy demand. Consider redesigning or adjusting usage for better performance.
calculator.nightOnlyNote: ⚠️ Since all outages occur at night, a battery of {{suggestedBattery}} kWh may be sufficient to cover {{nightLoad}} Wh consumption without requiring solar panels.
calculator.spaceNote: Required space: {{area}} m² (south-facing, unshaded) to install {{count}} panel(s) of {{watt}} W each ({{panelName}}).
calculator.largeAreaNote: ⚠️ The required installation area ({{area}} m²) is relatively large. Ensure space availability or contact us to optimize the layout.
calculator.supportNote: Our technical team is ready to design a tailored solar system and offer solutions to optimize performance or reduce costs. Contact us at 009647749992888.
calculator.teamSignature: — Technical Team – Your Solar Energy Company —
calculator.lossNote: Note: Calculations include battery efficiency loss (15%) and solar panel loss (10%) for realistic estimation.
calculator.scheduleSummary: Schedule: {{cutDuration}} h outage → {{availableHours}} h grid → repeats {{cycles}} times/day
calculator.cutScheduleExplanation: Power schedule: National grid is available for (X) hours, then off for (Y) hours, repeating daily.
calculator.availableHoursPlaceholder: Number of hours before next outage
calculator.chargeWarning: ⚠️ Grid availability ({{availableHours}} hrs) may be insufficient to fully charge the battery, especially at night.
calculator.questionSystemType: What type of system are you looking for? (Economical, Reliable, High Performance)
calculator.questionGovernorate: Which governorate are you located in?
calculator.questionGoodSunlight: Does your area receive good sunlight?
calculator.questionHighBuildings: Are there tall buildings nearby that could shade the panels?
calculator.questionPriority: What’s your priority? (Cost Saving, Full Coverage, High Output)
calculator.questionAmpHour: What is your estimated daily consumption (in Ah)?
calculator.questioncycleCut: Please enter your power cut pattern (e.g., 3h off, 3h on)
calculator.questionCutPeriod: What are the durations of outages and grid availability?
calculator.questionBattery: What battery capacity are you considering? (Or let the system choose for you)
calculator.questionInverter: What inverter capacity are you considering? (Or let the system choose for you)

errors.availableHours: عدد ساعات التجهيز غير صالح. الرجاء إدخال رقم بين 1 و 24.
